job_description:
SEO Backlinks Intern

Enfin Technologies India (P) Ltd C 24, -2 Floor, Thejaswini, Technopark Campus Trivandrum, Kerala. , 695581 http://www.enfintechnologies.com

Closing Date: 10, Sept 2025 Job Published: 25, Aug 2025 Contact Email: hr@enfintechnologies.com

Brief Description

We are looking for an enthusiastic SEO Backlinks Intern to join our digital marketing team. The role involves learning and applying SEO strategies to build high-quality backlinks, improve search rankings, and contribute to overall website growth.

Duration: 3 Months Stipend: ₹6,000 per month Location: 2 weeks of training at the office (Trivandrum), followed by hybrid/remote mode

Key Responsibilities:

  • Assist in identifying and building high-quality backlinks.
  • Research websites, blogs, and online platforms for outreach opportunities.
  • Support in creating and executing link-building strategies.
  • Monitor backlink performance and maintain reports.
  • Collaborate with the SEO team to improve domain authority and rankings.

Preferred Skills/Requirements:

  • Basic understanding of SEO and digital marketing concepts.
  • Strong communication and research skills.
  • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
  • Eagerness to learn and apply SEO best practices.

What We Offer:

  • Hands-on training in SEO and link-building strategies.
  • Mentorship from experienced professionals.
  • Flexible hybrid/remote working option after initial training.
  • Exposure to real-time digital marketing projects.

Interested candidates can share their resumes to hr@enfintechnologies.com.
summary: Enfin Technologies is seeking a motivated SEO Backlinks Intern. This role involves hands-on training in SEO strategies and contributing to website growth through effective link building.

job_description:
Magento Developer

KENLAND IT SOLUTIONS (P) Ltd 3rd & 5th FLOORS, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA , 695581 https://www.kenland.in

Closing Date: 30, Sept 2025 Job Published: 25, Aug 2025 Contact Email: recruiter@kenland.in

We are seeking a skilled PHP Laravel Magento Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in PHP, Laravel, and Magento, with a strong background in developing and maintaining web applications and eCommerce platforms. You will work on building high-performance, scalable solutions while ensuring security, reliability, and maintainability. Immediate joiners preferred.

Key Responsibilities:

Magento Development:

  • Develop and customize Magento themes and extensions.
  • Configure and maintain Magento e-commerce websites.
  • Implement new features and functionalities based on business requirements.

Backend Development:

  • Build and maintain PHP-based applications.
  • Optimize application performance and database queries.
  • Integrate third-party APIs and services with Magento.

Code Quality:

  • Write clean, scalable, and well-documented code.
  • Conduct code reviews and optimize legacy code.

Collaboration:

  • Work closely with UI/UX designers, front-end developers, and stakeholders.
  • Provide technical solutions and recommendations.

Testing and Maintenance:

  • Perform unit and integration testing.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in a timely manner.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • Proven experience as a Magento Developer (Magento 3yrs preferred).
  • Strong knowledge of PHP, MySQL, and OOP principles.
  • Experience with front-end technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery).
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • Knowledge of Magento's architecture, coding standards, and security best practices.
  • Experience in integrating payment gateways, shipping methods, and third-party APIs.
  • Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.

Preferred Skills:

  • Magento Certification (Developer or Solution Specialist).
  • Knowledge of frameworks like Laravel or Symfony.
  • Experience with Docker, Jenkins, or other CI/CD tools.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.
summary: Seeking a skilled Magento Developer with PHP, Laravel, and e-commerce platform experience. Responsibilities include Magento development, backend optimization, and collaboration to build scalable solutions.

job_description:
Lead Generation Specialist

KENLAND IT SOLUTIONS (P) Ltd 3rd & 5th FLOORS, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA, 695581 https://www.kenland.in

Closing Date: 30, Sept 2025 Job Published: 25, Aug 2025 Contact Email: recruiter@kenland.in

Job Title: Lead Generation Specialist Experience Required: Minimum 1 year in the Software/IT industry Employment Type: Full-Time

Job Summary: We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented Lead Generation Specialist to join our growing sales and marketing team. The ideal candidate will have at least 1 year of experience in the software industry, with a proven ability to identify, qualify, and nurture leads through various outbound and inbound channels. You will play a key role in building a strong pipeline of prospects for our sales team.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Conduct market research to identify potential clients and target segments
  • Generate leads via email campaigns, LinkedIn outreach, cold calling, and other digital tools
  • Qualify prospects through discovery calls and prepare lead profiles for the sales team
  • Maintain and update the CRM system (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce) with accurate lead information
  • Collaborate with marketing to align lead generation efforts with campaigns and strategies
  • Track and report lead generation metrics and optimize processes based on performance
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, target customer personas, and competitive landscape.

Preferred Skills/Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field
  • Minimum 1 year of experience in a lead generation or sales development role in the software or IT industry
  • Familiarity with CRM software (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot)
  • Experience with lead generation tools such as LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Apollo, ZoomInfo, etc.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team
  • Goal-oriented with strong organizational and time management skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience working with SaaS products or B2B software sales
  • Understanding of sales funnels and pipeline management
  • Knowledge of email automation and campaign tools (e.g., Mailchimp, Lemlist)
summary: Kenland IT Solutions is seeking a Lead Generation Specialist to identify and qualify leads. The role involves market research, CRM management, and collaboration with marketing to build a strong sales pipeline.

job_description:
Digital Marketing Manager

SRS Global Technologies (P) Ltd 1st level Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark, Karyavattom PO, Thirivananthapuram, Kerala, 695581 https://srsglobaltechnologies.com

Closing Date: 14, Sept 2025 Job Published: 25, Aug 2025 Contact Email: hr@srswebsolutions.com

Brief Description

We are looking for a tech-savvy, data-driven Digital Marketing Manager to lead the digital marketing efforts of our SaaS company. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of B2B SaaS marketing strategies, customer acquisition funnels, and retention tactics. You will be responsible for driving demand generation, optimizing marketing campaigns, and ensuring the growth of our customer base through innovative digital marketing strategies.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute a comprehensive digital marketing strategy to achieve lead generation, user acquisition, and revenue growth goals.
  • Map the customer journey and optimize touchpoints across all digital platforms.
  • Implement and manage inbound and outbound marketing campaigns to generate high-quality leads.
  • Develop and optimize email nurturing workflows to guide leads through the sales funnel.
  • Collaborate with the content team to produce engaging content (blogs, case studies, whitepapers, webinars) tailored to the SaaS audience.
  • Oversee content distribution across channels to ensure maximum reach and engagement.
  • Drive organic traffic growth through SEO best practices, including keyword research, on-page optimization, and link building.
  • Manage PPC campaigns (e.g., Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Meta Ads) to ensure cost-effective customer acquisition.
  • Oversee website performance, UX, and CRO (Conversion Rate Optimization) to increase visitor-to-lead conversions.
  • Collaborate with developers and designers to maintain and enhance the SaaS website.
  • Develop and execute social media strategies to engage SaaS prospects and build a community of brand advocates.
  • Monitor industry trends and competitor activities to maintain a competitive edge.
  • Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to evaluate campaign success and identify areas for improvement.
  • Create dashboards and reports to share insights with stakeholders and guide decision-making.
  • Plan and manage the digital marketing budget to maximize ROI.
  • Conduct regular cost-benefit analyses for campaigns and initiatives.
  • Collaborate with sales, product, and customer success teams to align marketing efforts with overall company goals.
  • Mentor and manage junior team members, fostering a culture of innovation and performance.

Preferred Skills

  • Expertise in SaaS marketing strategies (free trials, conversions, customer-centric messaging).
  • Lead generation through content, SEO, paid ads, email campaigns, and conversion rate optimization (CRO).
  • Proficient in SEO tools (Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Ahrefs, Moz).
  • Hands-on experience with paid ad platforms (Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Meta Ads).
  • Expertise in email marketing and automation (segmentation, drip campaigns) for lead nurturing and retention.
  • Strong content strategy skills: blogs, case studies, landing pages, webinars.
  • Skilled in A/B testing, interpreting SaaS metrics, and optimizing user engagement.
  • Experience with CRM and marketing automation tools (HubSpot, Salesforce).
  • Solid understanding of SEO (on-page optimization, keyword research, backlinks).
  • Technical knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as they relate to SEO and website optimization.
  • Proficient in managing PPC campaigns and remarketing strategies for lead generation.
  • Collaborative approach with sales teams to align marketing campaigns and improve conversions.
  • Strong leadership and team management skills, including cross-functional collaboration.
  • Excellent communication, storytelling, and presentation abilities.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Qualifications:

  • Education: Any Degree
  • Experience: 5+ years of experience in digital marketing, with at least 2 years in a SaaS or B2B environment

Requirement:

  • Should be willing to work in U.S shifts.
  • Immediate joiners preffered.
summary: Seeking a Digital Marketing Manager to spearhead digital efforts for a SaaS company, focusing on lead generation and customer acquisition. Responsibilities include optimizing campaigns, managing budgets, and collaborating with various teams.

job_description:
Alamy Images India - Senior Engineer - DevOps

Location: Technopark Campus, Thiruvananthapuram Website: http://www.alamy.com Closing Date: 11, Sept 2025 Job Published: 25, Aug 2025 Contact Email: jobsindia@alamy.com

Brief Description: Are you passionate about automating cloud infrastructure for serverless and containerized applications? Do you want to drive innovation using new technologies? If you enjoy challenges and have knowledge of integration technologies and patterns, including queuing and messaging technologies, this role is for you!

Your Responsibilities:

  • Building high quality, scalable, resilient, and performant products and services.
  • Developing and managing CI/CD pipelines and DevOps toolchains.
  • Collaborating on software and systems architecture.
  • Leading on automation, including release automation, deployment pipelines, and testing.
  • Working with stakeholders to drive improvements and efficiencies in delivery.
  • Collaborating with Product, Technology, and Business Stakeholders to drive efficient solution design, development, and delivery.
  • Collaborating with IT Services to ensure solutions are appropriately transitioned into operations and engineered for cost/resource efficiency.
  • Participating in regular workshops for cross-squad learning and development.

Preferred Skills:

  • 6+ years in DevOps with experience in designing and implementing scalable solutions using best practices such as microservices.
  • Expertise in cloud platforms and infrastructure including AWS and GCP, alongside Infrastructure as Code such as Terraform, CloudFormation, Serverless Framework.
  • Experience in CI/CD pipelines and DevOps toolchains, such as Jenkins, GitHubActions and CircleCI.
  • Experience with event-driven or serverless technologies, e.g., Lambda.
  • Experience with containerization technologies and orchestration platforms, e.g., Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Excellent communication skills to articulate ideas to both technical and non-technical audiences.
  • Understanding of networking, distributed systems, web technologies/protocols, and end-to-end performance.
  • Knowledge of integration technologies and patterns, including queuing and messaging technologies (e.g., AWS SQS/SNS/StepFunctions).
  • Experience with persistence & database storage (e.g., Relational, NoSQL) and search technologies (e.g., Solr, ElasticSearch).
  • Understanding of Agile working patterns and frameworks (e.g., Scrum/Kanban).
  • Able to confidently apply practices and principals across multiple business areas
  • Passion for learning, technology, and delivering quality products.

APPLY NOW: https://alamyltd.peoplehr.net/Pages/JobBoard/Opening.aspx?v=f6b8ca5b-31ef-4b74-bba8-e9ec7ba73587
summary: Alamy Images India is seeking a Senior DevOps Engineer to automate cloud infrastructure and drive innovation. The role involves building scalable solutions and managing CI/CD pipelines.

job_description:

Brief Description:

Are you a results-driven digital marketer with a passion for Google Ads? We're looking for a talented and motivated Digital Marketing Executive to join our team. If you have a solid understanding of pay-per-click (PPC) campaigns and a proven track record of driving conversions, we want to hear from you.

As a Digital Marketing Executive, you'll be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing our paid search campaigns to increase brand awareness, website traffic, and sales. You'll work closely with our marketing team to optimize our digital strategy and ensure our campaigns meet key performance indicators (KPIs).

  • Conduct keyword research and analysis to identify new opportunities.
  • Monitor and analyze campaign performance, making data-driven decisions to improve results.

job_description:
Senior Finance Manager

Vismaya InfoTech Solutions (P) Ltd 1st Floor, Module L-12D, Tejaswini Building, Technopark Campus, Kazhakoottam, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695581 https://vismayacorp.com

Closing Date: 14, Sept 2025 Job Published: 24, Aug 2025 Contact Email: aiswarya.sunil@vismayacorp.com

We are seeking a highly experienced and strategic Senior Finance Manager with 10+ years of progressive experience in financial management. The ideal candidate will lead financial planning, budgeting, forecasting, and reporting processes, ensuring compliance and alignment with the company’s financial goals. The role demands strong analytical skills, business acumen, and the ability to lead and influence cross-functional teams.

Key Responsibilities:

Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A): - Lead long-term financial planning, annual budgeting, and quarterly forecasting. - Analyze trends, costs, revenues, financial commitments, and obligations. - Deliver insights to support business decisions and improve profitability.

Reporting & Compliance: - Prepare accurate monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports. - Ensure timely compliance with tax, statutory, and regulatory filings. - Coordinate internal and external audits.

Cash Flow & Treasury Management: - Oversee daily cash flow management and forecasting. - Optimize working capital, banking relationships, and investment strategies.

Cost Control & Risk Management: - Monitor operational costs and identify areas for savings. - Assess and mitigate financial risks including currency, credit, and interest rate exposure.

Team Leadership: - Manage and mentor a team of finance professionals. - Foster a culture of accountability, continuous improvement, and excellence.

Preferred Skills: - 10+ years of experience in IT companies (GCC experience is a plus) - Strong understanding of financial regulations, India and GCC Statutory, taxation and Tally. - Proficiency in financial software (e.g., SAP, Oracle, QuickBooks, or advanced Excel modelling) - Bachelor’s degree in finance, Accounting, or Economics (Master's or MBA preferred) - Excellent communication skills - Strong stakeholder management and influencing skills - Professional certifications like CA / CPA / CMA are a plus

NOTE: Interested candidates kindly mail your resumes to careers@vismayacorp.com / aiswarya.sunil@vismayacorp.com with subject line as "APPLICATION FOR SENIOR FINANCE MANAGER".
summary: We need a Senior Finance Manager to lead financial planning, reporting, and compliance. They will manage a team and ensure alignment with financial goals.
